info: There were 3 deaths and severe injuries caused by traffic crashes here between 2009 and 2012.
hcc_text: Jerome Avenue is a pedestrian high crash corridor (top third for pedestrian deaths and serious injuries per mile in the Bronx)
intersection: Jerome Avenue at Major Deegan Expressway Sb En Jerome A, Major Deegan Expressway Nb Exit 13, Major Deegan Expressway Sb Exit 13 and East 233rd Street
